participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, with a focus on family and professions.
participant_1.background: I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. What's up? I am a 46-year-old single dad with kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and nostalgic, with a passion for music and dance.
participant_2.background: I love New Kids on the Block. My favorite toy as a child was my Lite-Brite. I was born in the early 80s. I also like old school hip hop and take dance lessons once a week.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i live in a three storey house.
my family is continuously growing.
i enjoy long walks with my dog.
i am a professional tennis player.
i'm married to a doctor.
